task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_title: Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break Interest Survey
task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_introduction_text: We are considering introducing a new mid-day mindfulness and stretching break program. Your feedback is crucial to help us tailor this initiative to your needs. Please take a few minutes to complete this survey.

survey_questions.question_text: How interested are you in participating in a mid-day mindfulness and stretching session?
What days of the week would you prefer for these sessions? (Select all that apply)
What time of day would be most convenient for you to participate?
What type of activities would you like to see included in the sessions?
Do you have any other suggestions or comments regarding the proposed program?

task_2_satisfaction_data_analysis.recommendation_for_next_year: To enhance participation and satisfaction, consider adding more prize categories and improving the mobile app for better user experience.
